chapters.title: Chapter 37: The Last Battle
chapters.info: Pansai, p. 752—Lifa's alleged business partner. She is actually Aravine, who is prentending to be a Darkfriend to slip by the Shadow's patrols. She claims to have stabbed Lifa as the start of said partnership, and has now taken over her run. Unknown to Faile, Aravine is actually a Darkfriend.
